string.text: %c[255,160,181,169]Science Camp:\n%c[255,245,240,218]What is it you want?
%c[255,160,181,169]Science Camp:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Wait a moment, I am going to disable the security system.
%c[255,160,181,169]Message:\n%c[255,245,240,218]You're on your own from here - we're not going in there with you, our orders are to hold this area.
%c[255,160,181,169]Unknown sniper:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Where are you going, stalker?
%c[255,160,181,169]Message:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Hey, he's shooting at our rats!
%c[255,160,181,169]Message:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Oh, hey! Come on over, let's talk!
%c[255,160,181,169]Major Kravtsov:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Come in, let's talk. You'll find me at our base. I'm waiting.
%c[255,160,181,169]Slug:\n%c[255,245,240,218]What the hell? Is he fucking dead?! Get over here!
%c[255,160,181,169]Message:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Hey, you! Go to the building next to the water tower. I need to talk to you.
%c[255,160,181,169]Incoming Message:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Bro, come out, alright? Relax, I just wanna talk.

%c[255,160,181,169]Toad:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Attention, everyone! From now on, the stalker known as Messer has decided to become a murderer! There's now a bounty on his head - let him serve as another example of how not to treat your fellow stalkers! If you are listening, Messer, you may still get a chance to atone for your sins... If you manage to get to me before someone else teaches you a good lesson...

%c[255,160,181,169]Toad:\n%c[255,245,240,218]What are you doing?! I'm going to tell everyone you are a fucking murderer if you kill one more stalker, you hear me?! You'll be dead before you even realize it!
%c[255,160,181,169]Toad:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Hey, are you out of your mind?! These are my guys! They're guarding my bunker!

%c[255,160,181,169]Toad:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Messer, what the fuck?! Is he dead?! Why the hell did I send you down there?! You still have amnesia, what am I gonna tell the troops?! Get over here, now!
%c[255,160,181,169]PDA:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Attention! Critical radiation contamination! Check the suit for leaks or leave the contaminated area immediately!

%c[255,160,181,169]Toad:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Messer, the soldiers have organized a raid on the bandits near your location, so be careful not to run into them. A couple of hours ago an army jeep left Cordon - there were 6 or 7 soldiers - and they were carrying some serious equipment with them. See if you can come back after they duke it out, you may be able to get some nice stuff from the aftermatch. Anyway, if you find anything interesting for me, I'll be in touch.
%c[255,160,181,169]Zyablikov:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Thanks for your help... I'd prefer to be left alone now.
%c[255,160,181,169]Message:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Stalker, come here, got something to discuss. I'm here, by the slope of the mountain.
%c[255,160,181,169]Professor:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Great, look towards the road to the Bar. When you see the helicopter, head towards the bunker.
%c[255,160,181,169]%c[255,160,181,169]Barkeep:\n%c[255,245,240,218]What's going on with the group? Damn it, Messer...
%c[255,160,181,169]Message:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Yes, it seems to be him.

%c[255,160,181,169]Lone Wolf:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Stalker, you've probably heard of the Bar by now, right? The place where stalkers gather and such? I can tell you the Barkeep is interested in you, but he won't be happy if you go to them empty-handed. There's a house in the Dark Valley, and the Barkeep is very interested in some documents that are supposed to be inside... You should go take a look around.

%c[255,160,181,169]Lone Wolf:\n%c[255,245,240,218]... This loot will be your pass to the elite, you'll practically rise to the top instantly. However, you can't get into the Dark Valley without some specialized gear - there's some kind of building in the area that generates maddening psi waves.

%c[255,160,181,169]Lone Wolf:\n%c[255,245,240,218]You need some psi-blockers. The troopers went on a raid there recently, and it looks like they're all dead. I have information that a couple of soldiers made it out to the Garbage. I'm sure one of them has some. They were last seen at a crossing where a small creek runs off of it.
%c[255,160,181,169]Lone Wolf:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Stalker, watch out, there's a pseudo-dog!

%c[255,160,181,169]Well, here we are. The room is all yours so make yourself comfortable, rest properly. The doors are only locked from the inside, and once the door is open, the room will be considered to be unnocupied. You can't lock it from the outside, and anyone will be free to come in and bring or take whatever they want... And, you have to be ready to evacuate at a moment's notice. Don't worry about it, though, just don't open the door until you're ready to go, and then we'll go to the Bar. We'll catch up with a drink or two.
%c[255,160,181,169]Lone Wolf:\n%c[255,245,240,218]You awake? Alright, let's go then.
Incoming message:\nSprout: Hey, bro, come with us! We got that bandit bastard that smoked seven of our guys pinned down, help us whack the son of a bitch!
%c[255,160,181,169]Zob:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Hey man, you got my gun...? What, you're keeping it for yourself? Alright, fine. Hope it doesn't get you far, asshole.

%c[255,160,181,169]Toad:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Messer, come in... So here's the situation: I need you to get an artifact for me. It's called the "Toad's Eye". Funny, I know - It's located in the northern area of the Garbage. I sent a squad there before, but I lost contact with them... I'm told the area specifically has no anomalous activity, but people are afraid to go there regardless. Shouldn't be a problem for you, though... I think. Sending the coordinates your way.

%c[255,160,181,169]Toad:\n%c[255,245,240,218]One more thing. That Flesh you shot stole some documents a courier of mine had on him while taking a nap in the factory, if you can believe it. He said the Flesh had some kind of lair on the roof, the docs may be up there. Find them and bring them to me, alright? Seriously, don't bother coming back without them.
%c[255,160,181,169]Toad:\n%c[255,245,240,218]I don't get it, is he dead or something? What the hell were you looking at? I sent you to him, Messer. Come back to the bunker...

%c[255,160,181,169]Toad:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Oh, I forgot. There's a tab in your PDA to check the contacts of nearby stalkers that are within a radius of about 250 meters from you. You can chat with them if you want, just select whoever you want in the Contacts section. Some stalkers have some info about themselves in their profiles as well. Try to reach Digger via PDA when you are near him to test it out.
%c[255,160,181,169]Toad:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Remember your PDA has a battery. Keep an eye on the charge level to avoid being left in the dark during an ugly situation...
%c[255,160,181,169]Toad:\n%c[255,245,240,218]How are you doing, still alive?

%c[255,160,181,169]Toad:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Messer, there's something going on at the checkpoint. I can't get any signal from there, it's like there's no one around. Weird. Listen, why don't you go check it out, quietly? Come back to me when you're done, and don't linger too long around the place...
%c[255,160,181,169]Watchdog:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Hey stalker, we'll talk after we deal with these fucking dogs, alright?...
%c[255,160,181,169]Watchdog:\n%c[255,245,240,218]How you feeling, rookie?
%c[255,160,181,169]Crow's Eye:\n%c[255,245,240,218]He looks fine. And he's no rookie either, didn't you see the way he took down that pseudo-dog? Good shit!
%c[255,160,181,169]Watchdog:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Yes... he's no newbie. Come, we need to talk.
%c[255,160,181,169]Duty:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Watch out! There's a pseudo-dog! Focus that thing, kill it now!
%c[255,160,181,169]Duty Leader:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Fighters, take your positions! The dead are coming. Messer, this is your chance to make your mark.
%c[255,160,181,169]Duty Leader:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Chin up, men! Another wave is coming!
%c[255,160,181,169]Duty Leader:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Attention all! We are detecting strange interference in the air... Be careful...
%c[255,160,181,169]Duty Leader:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Okay, we've got the rat, all right... he's pushing our ammo to the left. Go to our merchant for the reward.
Incoming message.\nAh... damn rats...
Incoming message.\nDamn it. I knew there was something wrong here. Let's just leave, guys...

Incoming message.\nSergei: The group is dead... God damned bloodsuckers! What the hell am I supposed to do now...? Thanks for coming with me, stalker. I owe you one. If you need me, look for me at the Bar, alright? I need a drink after this mess...
Incoming message.\nFucking door.
I've got some special orders here... Bring anything weird you find. You never know what kind of surprise the Zone will spring on you next time... Oh, and hurry. You're the only one on the look-out.

Hey, are you outside the Cordon now? I was told a strange artifact was seen in that area. Bring anything strange you find. You never know what kind of surprise the Zone will give you next time. There's a tenfold fee for this unknown artifact, so hurry up, you're not the only one looking for it.
There's information about a special artifact nearby. Bring anything weird you find. You never know what surprise the Zone will give you next time.
%c[255,160,181,169]Message:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Hmm, looks like the source of the contagion...
%c[255,160,181,169]Message:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Hmm, looks like the source of the contagion...
%c[255,160,181,169]Message:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Messer, this is the leader of the Duty faction. I'm waiting for you at my office. We need to talk.
%c[255,160,181,169]Major:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Hello, Rat, trying to do your business behind my back?
%c[255,160,181,169]Rat:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Hello, Major. I was acting solely on your instructions.
%c[255,160,181,169]Rat:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Do I have to repeat myself?
%c[255,160,181,169]Incoming message:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Max.\nIt's working! Let's run to the hall and see what's going on!
%c[255,160,181,169]Incoming message:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Max.\nThe light is on, my friend, the light is on!
%c[255,160,181,169]Incoming message:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Max.\nThis is it! This is what I was talking about!
%c[255,160,181,169]Incoming message:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Max.\nYes, I'm coming to you.
%c[255,160,181,169]Message:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Shit, there's someone out there, everybody be on the lookout!
%c[255,160,181,169]Message:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Group\nEveryone group up! Remember, our goal now is to get to the tunnel leading to Rostok.
%c[255,160,181,169]Message:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Leader\nOkay, it seems all is quiet, now. Come stalker, we'll discuss what to do next...
%c[255,160,181,169]Message:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Leader\nKeep quiet... Everyone check your guns...
%c[255,160,181,169]Message:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Leader\nThere's something there...
%c[255,160,181,169]Message:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Black Slug\nHalt! Let's take the bastards down! Whoa... who are these guys?
%c[255,160,181,169]Message:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Black Slug\nOkay, put the guns away, guys. This is just an ID check. You try to run, you're gonna get shot. I'm dead serious.
%c[255,160,181,169]Message:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Black Slug\nWhat the hell?! Nail, go check it out. We're holding these ones, don't piss--
%c[255,160,181,169]Message:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Black Slug\nThere's nothing here! Let's go get these guys and get the fuck outta here!
%c[255,160,181,169]Message:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Black Slug\nYou! Get your backpack off!
%c[255,160,181,169]Message:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Black Slug\nFuck! Get the fuck away!
%c[255,160,181,169]Message:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Leader\nMesser! Get out of here, let's go!
%c[255,160,181,169]Message:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Leader\nMesser! Follow me, let's get out of here, hurry up! What the hell is this place!? That thing dragged you down here before I could get here!

%c[255,160,181,169]Message:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Leader\nIt's quiet. Shit. Go to the bar, talk to the Barkeep about what happened. I'm not going with you, I have some things I need to take care of... Go!

%c[255,160,181,169]Chrome:\n%c[255,245,240,218]I think I got a signal. Wait a bit, our guys will give them a warm welcome. If you can, do us a favor and help our guys. I don't think they'll know who attacked them in the dark.
%c[255,160,181,169]Freedomer:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Quiet, boys. Let's try to go in, quietly...
%c[255,160,181,169]Message:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Monolith\nStalker, get out of here... this is none of your business.
%c[255,160,181,169]Message:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Hey, stalker! Come here, I have something for you!
%c[255,160,181,169]Message:\n%c[255,245,240,218]This password expired on 20.02.2012. Please enter a new password.
Fuck... Fucking Slug...
%c[255,160,181,169]Message:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Uh, hey you, bro, come over here, just around the corner.
%c[255,160,181,169]Message:\n%c[255,245,240,218]Jackal\nMesser, turn on your PDA and find me through the Contacts tab. I'll tell you what's going on...
